NewsArticle.Title: Dark Ages 7.05 Patch Coming Soon
NewsArticle.Content:
7.05 patch - soon after the Adoration, Dark Ages will be patching from 7.04 to 7.05. This patch will address minor bugs within the client.
Horses of the Gods - This event will take place soon after the patch. The horse of each god has escaped their realm and are now wandering the terrestial lands of Temuair. It is up to you Aislings to bring these horses back to the gods. A great reward awaits!!
Summoner Spells - new summoner spells will be coming after the patch as well.
